Recruiterflow Chrome Extension - The ultimate Chrome extension for recruiters

Your perfect companion for social sourcing. Recruiterflow is the easiest and most accurate Chrome extension for recruiters to find anyone's email ID from their social profile. Recruiterflow can locate anyone's email ID. We have a powerful database of over 200 million profiles in the US and over 600 million profiles worldwide. You can use Recruiterflow on social networks like Facebook, Twitter, Github, Stackoverflow, and Dribbble.

With Recruiterflow, you can add candidates to your Recruiterflow account and start running drip campaigns to attract the best talent.
